Class UiUtils

java.lang.Object
taskmanagement.ui.util.UiUtils
public final class UiUtils extends Object
Swing utilities for styling widgets in a consistent, theme-aware way.

This class is append-only: legacy helpers remain intact and new helpers are added without breaking existing signatures.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static final class 
    UiUtils.RoundedMatteShadowBorder
    Rounded matte border with a soft bottom shadow (no external libraries).

  • Method Details

    • styleStableHoverButton

      public static void styleStableHoverButton(JButton b, Color baseBg, Color baseFg)
      Styles a JButton to keep stable size on hover/press (no layout shift) while providing simple color feedback.
      Parameters:
      b - the button to style
      baseBg - base background color
      baseFg - base foreground (text/icon) color

    • shiftForContrast

      public static Color shiftForContrast(Color c, float ratio)
      Shifts a color toward light or dark depending on its luminance.
      Parameters:
      c - the base color
      ratio - blend ratio in [0..1]
      Returns:
      a color blended toward black or white to increase contrast

    • bestTextFor

      public static Color bestTextFor(Color bg, Color preferred)
      Chooses a readable text color for a given background.
      Parameters:
      bg - background color
      preferred - preferred foreground
      Returns:
      the most readable color among preferred/white/black

    • blend

      public static Color blend(Color a, Color b, float t)
      Linear blend between two colors.
      Parameters:
      a - first color
      b - second color
      t - blend factor in [0..1]
      Returns:
      blended color

    • luminance

      public static float luminance(Color c)
      Approximates sRGB relative luminance.
      Parameters:
      c - color
      Returns:
      luminance in [0..1]

    • srgbToLin

      public static float srgbToLin(float c)
      Converts sRGB component to linear space.
      Parameters:
      c - component value in [0..1]
      Returns:
      linearized component

    • contrastRatio

      public static double contrastRatio(Color a, Color b)
      Computes a WCAG-like contrast ratio.
      Parameters:
      a - first color
      b - second color
      Returns:
      contrast ratio (>=1)

    • centerHoriz

      public static void centerHoriz(JComponent c)
      Aligns a component horizontally to the center (useful for BoxLayout Y_AXIS stacks).
      Parameters:
      c - component to center

    • createSquareActionButton

      public static JButton createSquareActionButton(String text, Icon icon, Color bg, Color fg, int size, int cornerRadius, float fontSize)
      Creates a square JButton with icon (top) and text (bottom), styled for dark backgrounds. Legacy signature used by ControlPanel.
      Parameters:
      text - button text
      icon - button icon (nullable)
      bg - background color
      fg - foreground color
      size - square size in pixels
      cornerRadius - corner radius
      fontSize - label font size
      Returns:
      configured button

      Attaches hover/pressed background behavior suitable for dark themes.
      Parameters:
      b - button to style
      base - base background color

    • darken

      public static Color darken(Color c, float factor)
      Darkens a color by a given factor.
      Parameters:
      c - base color
      factor - darkening factor in [0..1]
      Returns:
      darkened color

    • loadRasterIcon

      public static Icon loadRasterIcon(String classpath, int w, int h)
      Loads a raster icon from the classpath and scales it.
      Parameters:
      classpath - resource path (e.g., "/icons/add.png")
      w - target width
      h - target height
      Returns:
      an Icon or null if not found or failed

    • tryLoadSvgIcon

      public static Icon tryLoadSvgIcon(String classpath, int w, int h)
      Attempts to load an SVG icon using FlatLaf Extras (if present on the classpath).
      Parameters:
      classpath - SVG resource path
      w - target width
      h - target height
      Returns:
      an Icon or null when FlatLaf Extras is unavailable

      Creates a small fallback icon (filled circle).
      Parameters:
      size - icon size
      color - fill color
      Returns:
      an Icon instance

      Returns:

      Styles a JTextField with explicit colors and alignment.
      Parameters:
      field - the field to style
      bg - background color
      fg - text color
      border - border color
      centered - whether to center the text horizontally

    • createPrimaryIconButton

      public static JButton createPrimaryIconButton(String text, Icon icon, int width, int height, int cornerRadius, Font font, Color bg, Color fg)
      Creates a primary rounded button with icon (left) and text (right), painted locally to avoid Look-and-Feel artifacts.
      Parameters:
      text - button text
      icon - button icon
      width - preferred width
      height - preferred height
      cornerRadius - corner radius
      font - font to use (nullable)
      bg - background color
      fg - foreground color
      Returns:
      configured button

    • createPaintedRoundedIconButton

      public static JButton createPaintedRoundedIconButton(String text, Icon icon, Color bg, Color fg, int size, int cornerRadius, float fontSize)
      Creates a rounded square button (size√ósize) that paints its own background, with an icon on top and text at the bottom.
      Parameters:
      text - button text
      icon - button icon
      bg - background color
      fg - foreground color
      size - square size in pixels
      cornerRadius - corner radius
      fontSize - font size
      Returns:
      configured button

    • styleHeaderPillButton

      public static void styleHeaderPillButton(JButton b, Color bg, Color fg)
      Styles a compact rounded header button (pill-like) with stable hover/press. The background is painted locally to avoid look-and-feel artifacts.
      Parameters:
      b - button to style
      bg - background color
      fg - foreground (text/icon) color
